mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn, article.* , level FROM article WHERE board_num = #{board_num} ORDER BY article_num) WHERE rn between (#{page}-1)*#{pageSize} +1 AND #{page}*#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (article_num, article_parent_num, board_num, article_group_num, article_title, article_content, mem_id, article_datetime, article_delete_yn) VALUES (article_num_seq.nextval, '', #{board_num}, article_num_seq.currval, #{article_title}, #{article_content}, #{mem_id}, sysdate, 'n')
mapper.delete: UPDATE article SET article_delete_yn = 'y' WHERE article_num = #{article_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET board_num =#{board_num}, article_title = #{article_title}, article_content = #{article_content}, article_datetime = sysdate WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id} AND article_num = #{article_num}
